# delegate

**Instance Property**

The delegate for the picker view.

## Declaration

```swift
@MainActor weak var delegate: (any UIPickerViewDelegate)? { get set }
```

## Discussion

The delegate must adopt the [doc://com.apple.uikit/documentation/UIKit/UIPickerViewDelegate] protocol and implement the required methods to return the drawing rectangle for rows in each component. It also provides the content for each component’s row, either as a string or a view, and it typically responds to new selections or deselections.

## Customizing the picker behavior

- **UIPickerViewDelegate**: The interface for a picker view’s delegate.
